title: patch 6.10 mastery levels 6 & 7
body: ok so I got Lucian level 5 and got two grade s games but where are my tokens?!?!? I cant find my tokens anywhere and I know that I need them to get level 6 can anyone help me?

replies.body:
While the new Champ Mastery for 6 & 7 should have gone live after the patch went live, it was not turned on immediately in EUW for a few hours.  It is currently turned on now though, and you should now be able to earn tokens for Champions!

Let me know if you have any further questions!
yeah if I have had chat restrictions does that stop me from earning tokens? and also how long is it until I can start earning loot again
